verses.roman:
tāṅra śiṣya-upaśiṣya,--tāṅra upaśākhā
eimata saba śākhā-upaśākhāra lekhā

synonyms: tāṅra—his; śiṣya—disciples; upaśiṣya—granddisciples and admirers; tāṅra—his; upaśākhā—subbranches; eimata—in this way; saba—all; śākhā—branches; upaśākhāra—subbranches; lekhā—to describe by writing.
translation: His disciples and granddisciples are his subbranches. To describe them all would be difficult.
